name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thomas Brady MATHIS, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J. and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thomas Brady MATHIS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
The judgment of sentence is affirmed.
ROBERTS, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph F. Leeson, Bethlehem, for appellant.
Charles H. Spaziani, Dist. Atty., John E. Gallagher, 1st Asst. Dist. Atty., Easton, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
333 A.2d 846
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thomas Brady MATHIS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 10, 1974.
Decided March 18, 1975.
Joseph F. Leeson, Bethlehem, for appellant.
Charles H. Spaziani, Dist. Atty., John E. Gallagher, 1st Asst. Dist. Atty., Easton, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J. and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
